name: mikroe.click.pir2
short_description: PIR 2 Click is a compact add-on board designed for high-performance motion detection applications. This board features the ZSLM323511, a dual-element balanced differential pyroelectric (PIR) sensor from Zilog. Key features include excellent EMI immunity, a low-profile surface mount package, and a typical field of view of 150 degrees on the X-axis and 139 degrees on the Y-axis. The board also integrates the ZCWM05GIV1 PIR lens for maximum IR transmissivity. Ideal for security systems, lighting control, and video doorbells, PIR 2 Click ensures reliable motion detection in various demanding environments.
